details.description:
The Jordan 3 Retro OG Black Cement (2024) is one of the most hyped and sought after sneakers of 2024, making it one of the hottest drops of the holiday season.

Originally making it's debut in 1988, this colorway has become iconic in the sneaker community and is one of the most timeless designs in the entire Jordan Brand line.These sneakers famously made their debut on Jordan's feet during the 1988 All-Star Game. The Black Cement 3s last released as a retro in 2018.

The Jordan 3 Retro OG Black Cement released on November 23rd, 2024, for a retail price of $220. Our experts love the Black Cement 3s due to their storied history and iconic color blocking, making them one of the most classic sneakers in the history of sneakerhead culture.

The Jordan 3 Retro OG Rare Air brings a fresh twist to a classic silhouette. Its black leather upper is complemented by grey suede overlays, replacing the traditional elephant print, and features mismatched Nike Air heel tabs, one reversed for a unique aesthetic. Accents of chile red, military blue, and coconut milk add vibrant pops of color, while the red Jumpman logo on the tongue ties the design together.

This release pays homage to early Jordan samples, embracing imperfections as marks of rarity. The combination of premium materials and unconventional details makes this sneaker a standout addition to any collection. Whether you’re a longtime fan or new to the Jordan legacy, the Rare Air offers a distinctive style statement.

The Jordan 3 Retro OG Rare Air was released on May 30, 2025, at a retail price of $210. Its colorway includes black, chile red, neutral grey, military blue, and coconut milk. This pair checks every box: iconic shape, bold updates, and that rare, sample-inspired flair. Add in the custom packaging and you’ve got a drop that’s as memorable on the shelf as it is on foot. This release is a fresh chapter in the AJ3 story.

The Air Jordan 3 Retro Black Cat (2025) is a revival of an iconic silhouette that exudes stealthy elegance. Wrapped in premium black nubuck, the sneaker showcases subtle accents of dark charcoal on its signature elephant print overlays. The monochromatic design is elevated by black patent leather, unique elephant print laces and minimal black and chrome branding, creating a clean yet powerful aesthetic that resonates with Jordan’s legendary "Black Cat" persona.

This modern interpretation of the Black Cat features updated materials, making it as functional as it is stylish. The classic Jumpman logo on the tongue and heel maintains its timeless appeal, while visible Air units in the sole provide both comfort and an enduring retro vibe. This sleek design perfectly balances contemporary flair with Jordan’s rich heritage.

Releasing on January 11, 2025, the Air Jordan 3 Retro Black Cat (2025) comes with a retail price of $200. This updated edition remains true to its roots, cementing its place as a staple for collectors and sneaker fans who value iconic design and unmatched craftsmanship.

details.colorway: Summit White/Hydrogen Blue-Legend Blue-Photon Dust-Pure Platinum-Sail
details.description:
The Jordan 3 Retro Lucky Shorts pays homage to one of Michael Jordan’s most well-known game-day rituals—wearing his UNC practice shorts under his uniform for good luck. This tradition, which began after his iconic 1982 NCAA Championship-winning shot, is now immortalized in sneaker form. The shoe boasts a summit white leather upper, complemented by photon dust grey accents on the toe guard and heel, creating a clean and classic foundation.

A nod to Jordan’s college days, legend blue makes a bold statement on the Jumpman logo and heel, ensuring the heritage is felt throughout the design. One of the standout details is the behind-the-tongue label, designed to mimic the tags found on basketball shorts. It references the years Jordan’s lucky shorts tradition was in full swing, adding a subtle but meaningful touch for die-hard fans. The sail midsole and pure platinum detailing round out the colorway, keeping the design refined yet fresh.

Released on February 22, 2025, the Jordan 3 Retro Lucky Shorts retailed at $200, bringing history and superstition to life through a timeless silhouette. With its mix of summit white, hydrogen blue, legend blue, photon dust, pure platinum, and sail, this pair is a perfect blend of legacy and everyday style.

The Jordan 3 Retro Seoul 2.0 blends basketball heritage with Korean pride in one unforgettable silhouette. A sequel to the ultra-limited 2018 edition, this pair pays homage to South Korea’s cultural iconography and the 1988 Seoul Summer Olympics. It returns with a crisp white leather upper, suede elephant print panels, and bold accents of sport royal and challenge red inspired by the Taegukgi flag.

Jordan Brand added subtle upgrades to set the 2.0 version apart: quilted blue collars, aged yellow midsoles, and the reversal of the original embroidery across the tongues. These thoughtful tweaks make the sneaker feel both fresh and reverent to its roots. It’s a refined evolution of a beloved design that merges MJ’s legacy with Korean flair.

The Jordan 3 Retro Seoul 2.0 was released on May 15, 2025, for a retail price of $200. Done in white, black, sport royal, challenge red, pale vanilla, and college grey, it captures the spirit of Seoul and the DNA of an all-time classic.

Jordan is traveling back in time to 1988 for the next part of their Reimagined series, with the release of the Air Jordan 3 Retro White Cement Reimagined.

Jordan used the same design and specs as the original 1988 Jordan 3 silhouette to help craft the second model of the Reimagined series. The Air Jordan 3 Retro White Cement is constructed with a white leather upper, and off-white colored midsoles and heel tabs, helping to give the sneaker a vintage design.

The Air Jordan 3 Retro White Cement Reimagined released March 11, 2023, with a retail price of $210.

The Jordan 3 Retro Black Cement (2024) (GS) is a relaunch of Tinker Hatfield’s iconic sneaker with gray elephant-print detailing and an eye-catching colorway of black, Fire Red, Cement Grey, and Sail.

Originally released in 1988 and last seen in 2013, the Black Cement (2024) (GS) Jordan 3 Retro boasts a tumbled leather upper in black with tonal stitching. Elephant print decorates the leather overlays at the forefoot and heel, while perforations add texture to the gray leather around the collar. Pops of Fire Red stand out on the Jumpman logo, the first three eyelets, the bottom of the shoe, and the underside of the tongue. Padding in the tongue and collar completes the look and protects the ankle.

Our experts like the tonal contrast provided by the raised, white Nike Air logo on the heel. The grade school-sized Jordan 3 Retro Black Cement (2024) (GS) was released on November 23, 2024, and sold for $150.

name: Jordan 3 Retro OG SP A Ma Maniére Diffused Blue

details.description:
The new Jordan 3 Retro OG SP A Ma Maniére Diffused Blue brings a fresh and sophisticated take on a classic silhouette, continuing the legacy of A Ma Maniére’s refined collaborations with Jordan Brand. This iteration swaps out the traditional elephant print for soft suede paneling, while the quilted satin interior lining adds a luxurious touch. The crisp white tumbled leather upper is complemented by diffused blue accents on the eyelets, heel tabs, and midsole, this colorway strikes a balance between vintage aesthetics and contemporary style.

Adding to its exclusivity, the sneaker features A Ma Maniére’s signature branding on the tongue, reinforcing the boutique’s commitment to craftsmanship and storytelling. A muslin midsole lends a nostalgic appeal, while the heel tabs include inspirational messaging—"All We Have is Each Other" and "You Need to Get Comfortable Walking Alone"—further solidifying its deeper narrative.

Released on March 29, 2025, the Jordan 3 Retro OG SP A Ma Maniére Diffused Blue retailed for $225. With its premium materials and a design ethos rooted in timeless elegance, this sneaker continues A Ma Maniére’s streak of highly sought-after Jordan collaborations.

name: Jordan 3 Retro OG SP A Ma Maniére While You Were Sleeping (Women's)

details.description:
The Air Jordan 3 Retro OG SP A Ma Maniére While You Were Sleeping (Women’s) is a stunning continuation of the celebrated partnership between A Ma Maniére and Jordan Brand. Known for its luxury aesthetics and storytelling, A Ma Maniére delivers yet another masterpiece with this black, violet ore, and flat pewter colorway. The sneaker, part of the larger "While You Were Sleeping" collection, stays true to the brand's signature style with premium materials and thoughtful design details. This release carries the same high standard that made the first A Ma Maniére Jordan 3 an instant classic.

This iteration features a black tumbled leather upper paired with premium suede overlays, creating a sophisticated yet edgy look. The violet ore accents subtly elevate the design, adding a unique touch that distinguishes it from other releases. A vintage-inspired midsole and outsole bring a worn-in, timeless vibe that fits perfectly with A Ma Maniére’s carefully curated aesthetic. Details like the Nike Air branding on the heel and the mix of Jumpman and A Ma Maniére logos on the tongues further emphasize the sneaker’s premium appeal. Inside, the diamond-quilted lining delivers that luxurious feel the brand is known for.

Released on August 20, 2024, the Air Jordan 3 Retro OG A Ma Maniére (While You Were Sleeping) edition retailed at $250. With its striking black, flat pewter, and violet ore colorway, this sneaker is the perfect fusion of luxury and heritage. As a highly anticipated drop, it showcases the elevated craftsmanship and storytelling that A Ma Maniére brings to every collaboration. Whether you’re a collector or someone looking to step up your style, this Jordan 3 is a must-have addition to any sneaker rotation.

The Air Jordan 3 Retro Fire Red 2022 brings back an OG colorway from the year 1988.

The top section of the Retro Fire Red is crafted from white leather with elephant print overlays done in dark gray at the heel and forefoot. The model also features contrasting fire red accents on the midsole, eyelets, and perforated leather collar. An airsole is nestled underfoot in the heel section, and the sneaker gets a fire red Jumpman on the tongue and a Nike Air logo on the heel.

The Air Jordan 3 Retro Fire Red 2022 was released on the 10th of September 2022 and initially retailed for $210.

name: Jordan 3 Retro Valentine's Day Treat Yourself (2025) (Women's)

details.description:
The Jordan 3 Retro Valentine’s Day Treat Yourself (2025) (Women’s) is a love letter to sneaker enthusiasts who appreciate a perfect blend of style and nostalgia. Dressed in a luxurious washed coral leather upper, this special edition release stays true to the classic Jordan 3 silhouette while adding a romantic twist. The iconic elephant print appears on the mudguard and heel in a shimmering pink hue, creating a subtle contrast that elevates the overall design.

Adding to its charm, gym red accents highlight the Jumpman logos and lower eyelets, giving the pair a striking pop of color. A standout feature is the set of two red jewel charmss, allowing wearers to personalize their look with a little extra sparkle. The midsole is finished in sail, complementing the pink upper, while a semi-translucent pink gum outsole provides the perfect finishing touch. Whether worn for a Valentine's date or simply as an everyday statement piece, this pair is a must-have for sneaker lovers.

Released on February 1, 2025, the Jordan 3 Retro Valentine’s Day Treat Yourself (2025) (Women’s) retailed at $200 and quickly captured the hearts of collectors and casual wearers alike. With its romantic washed coral, gym red, and sail colorway, this sneaker celebrates love and style in a way only Jordan Brand can.

The Jordan 3 Retro Black Cat (2025) (GS) is a sleek and stylish sneaker designed for the younger generation. This Grade School edition showcases a monochromatic black colorway that pays homage to the iconic 'Black Cat' nickname of Michael Jordan. The upper is crafted with premium materials, featuring a combination of smooth and tumbled leather for a luxurious look and feel. The signature elephant print detailing on the toe and heel adds a classic touch to this modern iteration.

Comfort and performance are at the forefront of this design. The visible Air unit in the heel provides responsive cushioning, while the padded collar ensures a snug and supportive fit. The rubber outsole offers excellent traction, making these sneakers suitable for both casual wear and light athletic activities. Our experts state this product is great for young sneaker enthusiasts looking for a versatile and timeless shoe that combines style and functionality.

Introducing the Air Jordan 3 Retro Cement Grey as the latest fresh take on a legendary sneaker that has been a staple in the Jordan lineup since its debut in 1988. This new colorway blends classic design elements with a modern twist, featuring a summit white leather upper that’s both clean and stylish. The signature elephant print and texture on the toe box and heel comes in dark grey, adding a touch of contrast that complements the cement grey on the midsole. The iconic Jumpman logo appears in red on the tongue and in black on the heel, making this release both familiar and brand new.​
​​
​The Air Jordan 3 is historically significant in sneaker culture, as it was the first Jordan model to feature the now-iconic Jumpman logo. It also introduced the elephant print and visible Air unit, which have since become hallmarks of the Jordan brand. The Cement Grey colorway stays true to this legacy, offering a fresh update that sneaker enthusiasts and basketball fans alike will appreciate. This Jordan 3 continues to deliver on both style and heritage.​
​​
​Released on August 31, 2024, the Air Jordan 3 Retro Cement Grey retailed at $200. What our experts love is the summit white, fire red, cement grey, and black colorway, that is a must-have for those who value a blend of classic design and modern appeal.

The Air Jordan 3 Retro Green Glow is an electrifying addition to the Jordan lineage, incorporating a mesmerizing green glow color treatment that first captivated fans on the Jordan 4. This new colorway, set against a backdrop of black, green glow, wolf grey, and white, is a bold reinterpretation of the iconic Jordan 3 silhouette. Designed for the sneaker aficionado who appreciates the blend of classic design and innovative accents, this sneaker is a testament to Jordan Brand's commitment to evolution while honoring its heritage.

Since its original release, the Jordan 3 has been celebrated for its revolutionary design, including the introduction of the visible Air unit and the elephant print detailing. The Green Glow version elevates the classic with its vibrant accents, offering a fresh take on the model's celebrated features. It's a sneaker that bridges the past and the present, appealing to both long-time Jordan enthusiasts and a new generation seeking to make a statement with their footwear.

Launched on March 16, 2024, for $200, the Air Jordan 3 Retro Green Glow quickly lit up the sneaker community, becoming a must-have for collectors and style trendsetters. Its release is celebrated as a moment when the iconic Jordan 3 silhouette was reimagined with a bold, new colorway, inviting wearers to step into the glow of Jordan Brand's innovative legacy.

The Jordan 3 Retro Craft Ivory is a sophisticated blend of iconic heritage and contemporary design. This rendition of the legendary silhouette comes in an Ivory/Grey Mist/Cream colorway, offering a refined and elegant take on a classic. The sneaker's design pays homage to the heritage of the Jordan brand while infusing modern elements that resonate with today's fashion-forward crowd.

Every aspect of the Jordan 3 Retro Craft Ivory, from its premium materials to its timeless design, exudes luxury and class. It represents a perfect balance between the Jordan brand's rich history and the evolving trends of sneaker culture. The subtle colorway enhances its versatility, making it suitable for various occasions, whether for casual outings or more formal events.

Released on February 3, 2024, for $210, the Jordan 3 Retro Craft Ivory quickly became a sought-after item among sneaker enthusiasts. Its elegance, coupled with the Jordan brand's reputation for quality and style, makes it a valuable addition to any collection.

Jordan Brand is paying homage to the final stages of Michael Jordan's NBA playing career with the Washington Wizards, with the release of the Jordan 3 Retro Wizards.

The Jordan 3 Retro Wizards features a similar design compared to the Air Jordan 3 Retro True Blue, but with a few twists. Jordan Brand used orange across the lace eyelets and Jumpman logo on the tongue compared to the red color scheme on the Air Jordan 3 True Blue.

The Air Jordan 3 Retro Wizards released April 29, 2023, with a retail price of $210.
